subject: Re: Conference Invitation - Zurich, Switzerland

The aim of the conference is to provide a platform to the researchers and practitioners from both academia as well as industry to meet and share cutting-edge development in the field Last Date For Early Bird Paper Submission Round: 20 June, 2013 Conference Date(s): Oct 12-13, 2013 Conference City : Zurich, Switzerland Joint International Conference consists of the following tracks: Track 1: Advances in Civil, Structural and Enviromental Engineering - ACSEE Website: [1] http://acsee.theired.org/ Track 2: Advances in Computing, Electronic and Communication - ACEC website: [2] http://acec.theired.org/ Track 3: Advances in Mechnical and Robotics Engineering - AMRE Website: [3] http://amre.theired.org/ Track 4: Advances in Social Science, Management and Human Behaviour - SMHB website: [4] http://smhb.theired.org/[5] [6] Joint Conference is being organized by The IRED (Institute of Research Engineers and Doctors), will be held during Oct 12-13, 2013 at Zurich, Switzerland. All the registered papers in the various tracks will proudly be published by IRED-CPS and stored in the SEEK digital Library. Each Paper will be assigned DOI (Digital Object Identifier) from CROSSREF. The Procc. will be submitted to ISI Thomson for Review and Indexing Please take the time to explore the website for more details, check on important dates, and keep yourself up to date on recent changes.[7] Registered Papers (UACEE Extended paper guidelines applicable) will be published in the various issues of International journals Prospective authors are invited to submit full (original) research papers; which are NOT submitted or published or under consideration anywhere in other conferences or journals; in electronic (PDF only) format via email Other IRED conferences can be found at [8] http://www.theired.org/conferences.html We Request you to forward this email to your colleagues/Researchers/students in order to promote the conference Thanks Much UACEE References: 1. http://acsee.theired.org/ 2. http://acec.theired.org/ 3. http://amre.theired.org/ 4. http://smhb.theired.org/ 5. http://www.eshb.theired.org/ 6. http://www.eshb.theired.org/ 7. http://www.benchmarkemail.com/c/l?u=20998A3&e=27DE9A&c=2E5C9&t=1&l=23A8D55&email=roVb%2B%2BWaTLhhsER1tbQoeJMtdysbAGpE 8. http://www.benchmarkemail.com/c/l?u=1FC775D&e=26C89B&c=2E5C9&t=1&l=33AFC1B&email=Ei8vwUB5FowHAZiCcTP6HhZvSxx3FN1CNyIeD9VsXLU%3D This message was sent to foaad@calpoly.edu by newsletter@theired.org You can modify/update your subscription via the link below Unsubscribe from all mailings http://www.benchmarkemail.com/c/su?e=2D253F&c=40CE7&l=256EAC6&email=GeKE%2FJi4xv18S7%2B5%2FktOoZB9gYFv4ITk&relid=4C4A98B6 Manage Subscription http://www.benchmarkemail.com/c/s?e=2D253F&c=40CE7&l=256EAC6&email=GeKE%2FJi4xv18S7%2B5%2FktOoZB9gYFv4ITk&relid=4C4A98B6 Forward Email http://www.benchmarkemail.com/c/f?e=2D253F&c=40CE7&l=256EAC6&email=GeKE%2FJi4xv18S7%2B5%2FktOoZB9gYFv4ITk&relid=4C4A98B6 Report Abuse http://www.benchmarkemail.com/Abuse?e=2D253F&c=40CE7&l=256EAC6&email=GeKE%2FJi4xv18S7%2B5%2FktOoZB9gYFv4ITk&relid=4C4A98B6 18 Lesley, Dr. Hampton Road, Melbourne, Victoria, Australia
Having trouble viewing this email? click here

Aplogize for Multiple Copies of this email!

Dear Professor/Researcher,

Joint International Conference will provide an excellent international forum for sharing knowledge and results in Information Technology, Computer Science, Electronics, Electrical, Mechanical, Civil, Structural and Environmental Engineering. The aim of the conference is to provide a platform to the researchers and practitioners from both academia as well as industry to meet and share cutting-edge development in the field.

Last Date For Early Bird Paper Submission Round: 20 June, 2013

Conference Date(s): Oct 12-13, 2013

Conference City : Zurich, Switzerland

Joint International Conference consists of the following tracks:

Track 1:  Advances in Civil, Structural and Enviromental Engineering - ACSEE

Website: http://acsee.theired.org/


Track 2: Advances in Computing, Electronic and Communication - ACEC

website: http://acec.theired.org/

Track 3:   Advances in Mechnical and Robotics Engineering - AMRE

Website: http://amre.theired.org/

 Track 4: Advances in Social Science, Management and Human Behaviour - SMHB

website: http://smhb.theired.org/

Joint Conference is being organized by The IRED (Institute of Research Engineers and Doctors), will be held during Oct 12-13, 2013 at Zurich, Switzerland. All the registered papers in the various tracks will proudly be published by IRED-CPS and stored in the SEEK digital Library. Each Paper will be assigned DOI (Digital Object Identifier) from CROSSREF. The Procc. will be submitted to ISI Thomson for Review and Indexing.

Please take the time to explore the website for more details, check on important dates, and keep yourself up to date on recent changes.

Registered Papers (UACEE Extended paper guidelines applicable) will be published in the various issues of International journals.

Prospective authors are invited to submit full (original) research papers; which are NOT submitted or published or under consideration anywhere in other conferences or journals; in electronic (PDF only) format via email.

Other IRED conferences can be found at http://www.theired.org/conferences.html

We Request you to forward this email to your colleagues/Researchers/students in order to promote the conference.

Thanks Much
UACEE

This message was sent to foaad@calpoly.edu by newsletter@theired.org
